results.name: 0 iff n is of the form 4^a*(8k+7), otherwise 1.
comment: 0 iff n is not the sum of three squares.
reference: J.-P. Allouche and J. Shallit, The ring of k-regular sequences, Theoretical Computer Sci., 98 (1992), 163-197.
link: J.-P. Allouche and J. Shallit, The ring of k-regular sequences, Theoretical Computer Sci., 98 (1992), 163-197.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 12 2002
